fields.description: The display name of the user.
fields.name: DisplayName

fields.description: The roles for that user. This property contains more qualifiers only when relevant - for example, if the member has owner privileges, the roles property contains owner as one of the values. Similarly, if the member is an in-tenant guest, the roles property contains guest as one of the values. A basic member shouldn't have any values specified in the roles property. An Out-of-tenant external member is assigned the owner role.
fields.name: Roles

fields.description: The timestamp denoting how far back a conversation's history is shared with the conversation member. This property is settable only for members of a chat.
fields.name: VisibleHistoryStartDateTime
